name: Vegan Parmesan Recipe
description: How to make Vegan Parmesan Cheese. Use Cashews, Pecans or Pepitas to make Dairy-free Parmesan cheese. Nut-free Vegan Parmesan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup Pepitas ((pumpkin seeds), or cashews, almonds or pecans or walnuts or a combination)
2 Tbsp bread crumbs (or gf crumbs or use more of the nut or seed)
salt to taste (,depends on the nutritional yeast satyness (use 1/4 to 1/2 tsp))
Other flavor additions: a bit of ground mustard and some lime zest

recipeInstructions.text: Pulse to a fine meal in a food processor. Pulse in 2 -3 second bursts. Taste and adjust salt and nutritional yeast for cheesier flavor. Store in an airtight container for upto a month and refrigerated for upto 2 months.
